nodes.text: Tibanna split was a dessert dish from the planet Bespin and named for its main export, Tibanna gas. It consisted of three scoops of Hood family "Bespinian best" ice cream with a choice of Denta bean ice cream, Trammistan chocolate ice cream or Beebleberry ice cream, and then garnished with various toppings, Atomically aerated cream and a zherry. It was served in Dex's Diner in the planet Coruscant for 3.7 credits.
Tibanna splits are based on real world banana splits.
